hypothesis_content.title: Political Memecoin (TRUMP) Decoupling in Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL market regimes (BTC 30-day volatility <50%), TRUMP memecoin price action decouples from general crypto sentiment and becomes driven primarily by political news/events, offering uncorrelated alpha.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In low-volatility, directionless crypto markets, narrative-driven assets like political memecoins attract attention and trade on idiosyncratic factors. TRUMP has shown clear sensitivity to U.S. political developments.
entry_conditions: Upcoming scheduled political event (debate, speech, poll release) within 5 days

exit_conditions.stop_loss: TRUMP/BTC correlation rises above 0.6 (recouples to market)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after the political event concludes

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: TRUMP price shows no significant reaction (>5%) to material political news during the holding period.
